name: Tornado Rally
description:
A very simple game I made for a midterm, it involves trying to complete as many laps through the track as you can, without getting run off the road by a tornado of cars that flies after you.

Asset Credits: 

  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/roadways/lake-race-track-55908
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/land/zombie-cars-and-weapons-pack-123388
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/universal-sound-fx-17256
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/ultimate-game-music-collection-37351
  • https://www.kenney.nl/assets/ui-pack
